idea-plugin.name: Paused Changelists
idea-plugin.description:
Pause changelists to keep them visible while shelving their changes.

Features

  • Toggle Pause: Right-click any changelist and select "Toggle Pause Changelist" or use Ctrl+Alt+P
  • Visual Marker: Paused changelists are marked with [PAUSED] prefix
  • Shelf Integration: Changes are shelved and reverted from working directory when paused
  • Restore to Original: Changes are restored to the same changelist when unpaused
  • No Disruption: Changelist remains visible in the Changes panel while paused

Usage

  1. Right-click on any changelist → "Toggle Pause Changelist"
  2. Changes are shelved and the changelist is renamed to [PAUSED] <name>
  3. Toggle again to unshelve and restore changes to the original changelist
